20 units sounds reasonable to me. I think we should also consider sharing tips on reducing trash production, like using reusable containers or composting food waste. This way, we can all contribute less to the trash in the first place. How about we start a small initiative to reduce our overall waste?
Emma

20 units each sounds like a solid plan, and I agree that reducing our overall waste is key. Let's start by sharing some tips and maybe even setting up a communal recycling station to make it easier for everyone. I'll bring up the idea of a small initiative at our next meeting and gather some initial ideas from all of you.

20 units each sounds like a balanced approach, and I'm glad we're all on the same page. I'll start by bringing some reusable containers to our next meeting and see if anyone else has any ideas to share. Let's make sure to keep the lines of communication open and support each other in reducing our waste. I think this initiative could really benefit us all.
Luke

20 units each sounds like a great plan, and I'm excited to see how our initiative to reduce waste goes.
